Body:
Description: I am opening this ticket at the request of our Desktop Engineers.
Apparently starting with macOS 14 and macOS 15, the Endpoint Protector Client is asking to use Bluetooth (see screenshot). 
They wanted to know why it's requesting this and is there a way to stop this from happening? I didn't see anything in the documentation regarding it.

Thanks!
Jacques
What We've Learned Updated: the Bluetooth allow pop-up from MacOS appear when both upgrading or fresh installing on a Mac. both manual and MDM installation have the same outcome
Next Steps Updated: waiting for the customer to either provide logs or set up a new remote session to do that
